org.mitre.synthea.engine

Class Logic.And

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.engine.Logic
      • org.mitre.synthea.engine.Logic.And
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    Logic

    public static class Logic.And
extends Logic
    The And condition type tests that a set of sub-conditions are all true. If all sub-conditions are true, it will return true, but if any are false, it will return false.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
